title: Are blonde people considered the most attractive? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was reading a book on how to be a pimp (I am not one but like to read stuff off the beaten path sometimes), what it said was the blond strippers make the most money in the United States. So assuming that information is correct, at least in the USA being a blond female has a strong correlation to being in demand.  (I will not say attractive since I personally find women of all hair colors attractive)

No. Indeed, I think that the average blonde person is generally less attractive than the average brunette person. Actors and models aren’t a faithful representation of a country's population as they are often chosen because they are more attractive than normal. And always remember that less than 4% of the world's population is blonde (16% if we also include dark blondes), so often attractive blondes aren't really blond.

Absolutely NO.The survey of 1,000 London women aged 18 to 30 found 52 per cent are most attracted to dark-haired men, while 18 per cent liked shaven or bald-headed men..Grey hair was selected by 13 per cent, while only seven per cent chose either blonde or ginger hair. https://www.standard.co.uk/news/londons-women-prefer-dark-hair-6328244.htmlAlso GAY men prefer dark hair men..
